name: frictionlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that happens very easily without anything to make it slower or more difficult: The system can quickly detect attacks, but only when the tools work with each other frictionlessly. The app allows content to be frictionlessly shared across social media platforms.
in a way that does not involve any friction (= the force that makes it difficult for an object to slide across or move through something): This little gadget will ensure that your drawers slide in and out frictionlessly. The bolt slid frictionlessly into position.
More examplesFewer examplesOver $5 billion dollars' worth of goods flow frictionlessly through our system every year.Live links make it easy for users to engage frictionlessly with the tweet.In an ideal world, international markets would work frictionlessly.
